mapper.sql: id, stu_id, teacher_id, invite_code, record_time, stu_rewards_money, stu_rewards_code, reason, company_id, rewards_money, pay_order_id
mapper.select: select count(distinct(stu_id)) from teacher_invite_reward_record where company_id = #{companyId}
select count(id) from teacher_invite_reward_record where company_id = #{companyId} and (reason = 2 or reason = 3);

select COALESCE(sum(p.pay_price),0) from pay_order p INNER JOIN teacher_invite_reward_record tirr on p.id = tirr.pay_order_id where tirr.company_id = #{companyId} and (tirr.reason = 2 or tirr.reason = 3)
select COALESCE(sum(rewards_money),0) from teacher_invite_reward_record where company_id = #{companyId}

select distinct(tirr.teacher_id) as tid,(select invite_code from teacher_invite_reward_record where teacher_id = tid limit 1) as invite_code, (select name from sys_config_teacher where id = tid) as name,(select mobile from sys_config_teacher where id = tid) as mobile, (select count(distinct(stu_id)) from teacher_invite_reward_record where teacher_id = tid) as invite_number, (select count(id) from teacher_invite_reward_record where teacher_id = tid and (reason = 2 or reason = 3)) as consume_times, (select COALESCE(sum(p.pay_price),0) from pay_order p inner join teacher_invite_reward_record tir on p.id = tir.pay_order_id where tir.teacher_id = tid and (tir.reason=2 or tir.reason = 3)) as consume_balance, (select COALESCE(sum(rewards_money),0) from teacher_invite_reward_record where teacher_id = tid) as reward_balance from teacher_invite_reward_record tirr inner join sys_config_teacher s on tirr.teacher_id = s.id where tirr.company_id = #{companyId}
and PERIOD_DIFF(date_format(now(),'%Y%m'),date_format(tirr.record_time,'%Y%m')) =1
and DATE_FORMAT(tirr.record_time,'%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')
and date_format(tirr.record_time,"%Y-%m-%d") >= '${startTime}' and date_format(tirr.record_time,"%Y-%m-%d") <= '${endTime}' and s.name like '%${name}%' or s.mobile like '%${name}%'
order by invite_number asc
order by invite_number desc
order by consume_times asc
order by consume_times desc
order by consume_balance asc
order by consume_balance desc
order by reward_balance asc
order by reward_balance desc
order by tid desc
limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}

order by invite_number asc

select tirr.id as id , IFNULL(s.mobile,uf.mobile) as mobile, IFNULL(s.name,uf.username) as name, tirr.reason as reason,tirr.stu_id as stu_id1,tirr.pay_order_id as pay_order_id1, if(reason=1,'',(select commodity_name from pay_order po inner join teacher_invite_reward_record tir on po.id = tir.pay_order_id where tir.pay_order_id = pay_order_id1)) as commodity_name, if(reason=1,tirr.record_time,(SELECT tir.record_time from teacher_invite_reward_record tir where tir.stu_id = stu_id1 and tir.reason = 0)) as invite_date, if(reason=1,'',tirr.record_time) as consume_date, if(reason=1,0,(select pay_price from pay_order po inner join teacher_invite_reward_record tir on po.id = tir.pay_order_id where tir.pay_order_id = pay_order_id1)) as consume_balance, if(reason=1,'',tirr.rewards_money) as reward_balance from teacher_invite_reward_record tirr inner join student s on tirr.stu_id = s.id inner join users_front uf on s.user_id = uf.id where tirr.company_id = #{companyId} and tirr.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and tirr.reason != 0
and (tirr.reason = 1)
and (tirr.reason = 2 or tirr.reason = 3)
and (s.name like '%${name}%' or s.mobile like '%${name}%' or uf.username like '%${name}%' or uf.mobile like '%${name}%')
order by mobile,name asc
order by mobile,name desc
order by consume_balance asc
order by consume_balance desc
order by id desc
limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}
